title: BBC Horizon 1984 Beyond the Moon 720p x264 AAC HDTV MVGroup.org
description:
Beyond the Moon (BBC)

Science Documentary hosted by James Burke, published by BBC broadcasted as part of BBC Horizon series in 1984 - English narration. 
http://docuwiki.net/images/c/c3/Beyond-the-Moon-BBC-Cover.jpg

Information
------------------------------
A chance to look back at a classic Horizon special in which James Burke looks at space exploration and exploitation. Originally transmitted in 1984, James begins by looking at the Apollo XI moon landing, before moving on to future space plans for humankind.
